languages.text: "Даже не знаю, шерин. Было бы неплохо до опьянения упиться свободой. Она так близко — руку протяни, ухватись, словно за хвост кометы... И можно оставить позади Миссию Касбаллики, начать самостоятельно вести дела, не уповая лишний раз на вашу милость. Впереди — одни возможности! Нужно лишь... пережить грядущую тьму".

"I don't know, shereen. Being drunk on unbridled freedom sounds nice. It's so close — I could reach out and grab it like the tail of a comet... and leave the Kasballica Mission behind, start doing things on my own without having to rely on your good favour. Limitless possibilities lie ahead! I just have to... survive the coming darkness."
languages.original_text: "Даже не знаю, шерин. Было бы неплохо до опьянения упиться свободой. Она так близко — руку протяни, ухватись, словно за хвост кометы... И можно оставить позади Миссию Касбаллики, начать самостоятельно вести дела, не уповая лишний раз на вашу милость. Впереди — одни возможности! Нужно лишь... пережить грядущую тьму".

It's so close — I could reach out and grab it like the tail of a comet... and leave the Kasballica Mission behind, start doing things on my own without having to rely on your good favour. Limitless possibilities lie ahead! I just have to... survive the coming darkness."

"I don't know, shereen. Being drunk on unbridled freedom sounds nice. It's so close — I could reach out and grab it like the tail of a comet... and leave the Kasballica Mission behind, start doing things on my own without having to rely on your good favour. Limitless possibilities lie ahead! I just have to... survive the coming darkness."

"I don't know, shereen. Being drunk on unbridled freedom sounds nice. It's so close — I could reach out and grab it like the tail of a comet... and leave the Kasballica Mission behind, start doing things on my own without having to rely on your good favour. Limitless possibilities lie ahead! I just have to... survive the coming darkness."

"I don't know, shereen. Being drunk on unbridled freedom sounds nice. It's so close — I could reach out and grab it like the tail of a comet... and leave the Kasballica Mission behind, start doing things on my own without having to rely on your good favour. Limitless possibilities lie ahead! I just have to... survive the coming darkness."

languages.text: 「わかんないね。自由を思いきり楽しむのも悪くなさそうだ。彗星の尾を掴むように、手を伸ばせばすぐに手に入りそうだ…そしてカスバリカ聖務団を離れて、あんたの力に頼らずに独り立ちすることもできる。可能性は無限だ！ とにかく、まずは…迫りくる闇を生き延びないとね」
languages.original_text: "I don't know, shereen. Being drunk on unbridled freedom sounds nice. It's so close — I could reach out and grab it like the tail of a comet... and leave the Kasballica Mission behind, start doing things on my own without having to rely on your good favour. Limitless possibilities lie ahead! I just have to... survive the coming darkness."

traits.locale_text: 「わかんないね。自由を思いきり楽しむのも悪くなさそうだ。彗星の尾を掴むように、手を伸ばせばすぐに手に入りそうだ…そしてカスバリカ聖務団を離れて、あんたの力に頼らずに独り立ちすることもできる。可能性は無限だ！ とにかく、まずは…迫りくる闇を生き延びないとね」

languages.text: “我不知道，亲爱的。无拘无束的自由听起来就很不错。它离我那么近，仿佛伸手就能抓到，好像抓住彗星的尾巴……将卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的一切抛诸脑后，去做我自己想做的事，不必再依赖你的好意。未来拥有无限的可能！而我只需要……熬过眼前的黑暗。”
languages.original_text: "I don't know, shereen. Being drunk on unbridled freedom sounds nice. It's so close — I could reach out and grab it like the tail of a comet... and leave the Kasballica Mission behind, start doing things on my own without having to rely on your good favour. Limitless possibilities lie ahead! I just have to... survive the coming darkness."

traits.locale_text: “我不知道，亲爱的。无拘无束的自由听起来就很不错。它离我那么近，仿佛伸手就能抓到，好像抓住彗星的尾巴……将卡斯巴利卡犯罪集团的一切抛诸脑后，去做我自己想做的事，不必再依赖你的好意。未来拥有无限的可能！而我只需要……熬过眼前的黑暗。”

languages.text: "Ich weiß es nicht, Shereen. Berauscht von ungezügelter Freiheit zu sein, das klingt schön. Ich stehe so kurz davor — ich könnte die Hand ausstrecken und sie mir greifen wie den Schweif eines Kometen ... Die Kasballica-Mission zurücklassen, selbständig leben, ohne auf Eure Gunst angewiesen zu sein. Grenzenlose Möglichkeiten liegen vor mir! Ich muss nur ... die kommende Dunkelheit überleben."
languages.original_text: "I don't know, shereen. Being drunk on unbridled freedom sounds nice. It's so close — I could reach out and grab it like the tail of a comet... and leave the Kasballica Mission behind, start doing things on my own without having to rely on your good favour. Limitless possibilities lie ahead! I just have to... survive the coming darkness."

traits.locale_text: "Ich weiß es nicht, Shereen. Berauscht von ungezügelter Freiheit zu sein, das klingt schön. Ich stehe so kurz davor — ich könnte die Hand ausstrecken und sie mir greifen wie den Schweif eines Kometen ... Die Kasballica-Mission zurücklassen, selbständig leben, ohne auf Eure Gunst angewiesen zu sein. Grenzenlose Möglichkeiten liegen vor mir! Ich muss nur ... die kommende Dunkelheit überleben."

languages.text: «No sé, shereen. La libertad sin límites es embriagadora. Está tan cerca que podría agarrarla, como la cola de un cometa... dejar atrás la Misión Kasballica y empezar a actuar por mí misma, sin tener que depender de su buena voluntad. ¡Las posibilidades son infinitas. Solo tengo... que sobrevivir a esta oscuridad».
languages.original_text: "I don't know, shereen. Being drunk on unbridled freedom sounds nice. It's so close — I could reach out and grab it like the tail of a comet... and leave the Kasballica Mission behind, start doing things on my own without having to rely on your good favour. Limitless possibilities lie ahead! I just have to... survive the coming darkness."

traits.locale_text: «No sé, shereen. La libertad sin límites es embriagadora. Está tan cerca que podría agarrarla, como la cola de un cometa... dejar atrás la Misión Kasballica y empezar a actuar por mí misma, sin tener que depender de su buena voluntad. ¡Las posibilidades son infinitas. Solo tengo... que sobrevivir a esta oscuridad».

languages.text: « Je ne sais pas, shereen. Ça ne me déplairait pas de m'enivrer d'une liberté sans entrave. Elle est presque à portée de main ; je pourrais m'en saisir comme de la queue d'une comète... et quitter la Mission de la Kasballica pour vivre ma vie sans avoir à compter sur vos bonnes grâces. Un monde infini de possibilités me tend les bras ! Encore faut-il que je survivre aux ténèbres qui nous menacent. »
languages.original_text: "I don't know, shereen. Being drunk on unbridled freedom sounds nice. It's so close — I could reach out and grab it like the tail of a comet... and leave the Kasballica Mission behind, start doing things on my own without having to rely on your good favour. Limitless possibilities lie ahead! I just have to... survive the coming darkness."

Un monde infini de possibilités me tend les bras ! Encore faut-il que je survivre aux ténèbres qui nous menacent. »
